section1.paragraph1: Avankart Partner is an application intended solely for employees of the organization. It is not possible to purchase products or services on this platform. Payments can only be accepted from Avankart People users through the application.
section1.paragraph2: You may be required to provide personal information during registration to access the application. This information is used solely for the purpose of accepting payments. The user is responsible for the accuracy and timeliness of the information provided. In case of providing incorrect information, the user may be blocked.
section1.paragraph3: Payments through Avankart Partner can only be made using the QR code or the 16-character identification number located under the code. Payments can only be made through the Avankart People application. The Partner application only facilitates the acceptance of payments.
section1.paragraph4: The application may only be used for legal purposes. Unauthorized access to other people's information or harm to third parties is strictly prohibited.
section1.paragraph5: The collected personal data is used solely for the purpose of accepting payments and is not transferred or sold to third parties under any circumstances. The application takes security measures, but these measures do not guarantee 100% security of the data.
section1.paragraph6: Avankart reserves the right to restrict or completely suspend a user's access to the application if the user fails to comply with these rules or uses the application for illegal purposes.
section1.paragraph7: Avankart may make technical or functional changes to the application at any time. The user is deemed to have accepted these changes by continuing to use the application.
section1.paragraph8: Avankart shall not be liable for any damage or loss arising from the use of the application. All risks and liabilities are borne by the user.
section1.paragraph9: Any complaints or inquiries regarding the application can be sent to us through the following means:
section1.paragraph10: Any complaints or inquiries regarding the application can be sent to us through the following means: E-mail: support@avankart.az

section2.paragraph1: Avankart Partner application may require you to provide your name, contact number, and other basic information during registration and use. This information is used solely for the purpose of accepting payments and improving the service.
section2.paragraph2: The collected data may be used for the following purposes:
section2.paragraph3: No personal data is shared, sold, or transferred for commercial purposes to third parties. Exceptions may only include court and law enforcement agencies based on legislation.
section2.paragraph4: Data is protected by modern technical means. However, the user should be aware that no digital system can provide complete protection.
section2.paragraph5: The application is not intended for children and does not collect data from individuals under the age of 18.
section2.paragraph6: Users have the right to view, modify, or delete their data. To do this, a written request can be sent to support@avankart.az.
section2.paragraph7: This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time. All changes will be announced within the application or through official channels.
section2.paragraph8: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, you may contact us:
